message.body: Sorry! Remembered you have crazy shows goin on right now.... Do'h. Hope the hamlet is treating yr bones well... Can't wait to see it!
Lesley is in...thanks for sending out yr spies! I'll be at the stood' on Friday from 3:30-6 if'n you wanna stop over!
SO relieved that leslie is on board. Thank goodness. Happy the birthday! 2tickets under my name at box office for you 2nite, doors open and drinks start at 10, show at 10:30
Yup...me too! Thanks so much for the tix, I'll see ya tonight!
Thank you so much! So sorry I had to run as soon as it ended...you were absolutely marvelous!
Happy birthday! Sorry I couldn't make it to the celebration, had rehearsal, buy hope you had a lovely eve!
Party tonite hosted by applied mechanics free triumph beer dollar suggested donation at 21st and washington! Come out in numbers!
Party tonight at 21st and washington, the machine shop, 9:30 till whenever. Triumph brews, tunes! Hosted by applied mechanics theatre co
So much love. You are inspiring.
You are the inspiring one! Thx so much fr coming!!
Hey kennedy, do u do sp work for nbome? And if so, may i use u as a reference?
Sent. U should have it now
